long_description: The Sanuk Fault Line flip-flops were designed for backyard BBQs, beachside lounging and enjoying the simple comforts of life, so why not partake?. Broad synthetic nubuck leather straps feature cotton canvas details for a snug fit, sharp looks and lasting performance. Soft neoprene linings are backed with polyester to help manage moisture and offer next-to-skin comfort. EVA topsoles and midsoles supply cushioning and lightweight support. Hardened EVA outsoles deliver lightweight traction. All-synthetic construction makes the Sanuk Fault Line flip-flops vegan-friendly.
